text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling down
Splashes on the ground
Feet start moving round
Lost inside the sound

[Verse 2]
Umbrellas all around
Colors blur profound
Puddles where we're bound
Jump without a sound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
All our worries gone away
Catch a moment in the spray
Living for today

[Verse 3]
Hands are intertwined
Truths we never find
Laughing like we're blind
Leaving thoughts behind

[Bridge]
Wind whispers our names
Sunlight plays its games
Clouds cannot contain
Joy that we reclaim

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
All our worries gone away
Catch a moment in the spray
Living for today
title: Dancing in the Rain
